verses.text: Aton yab'ixal eb' yinhtilal winhaj Adán tik t'a stzolal. Ayic ix b'oji eb' anima yuj Dios, icha Dios ix aj eb'.
Ix b'oji winh vinac yet' pax ix ix, ix yak'anpax swach'k'olal t'a yib'anh eb'. Atax t'a jun k'u chi' ayic ix b'ojiel eb' yuj, anima ix sb'iejkan eb' yuj.
Ha winhaj Adán chi', 130 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji junxo yuninal winh scuchan Set, lajan ix aj yet' smam chi'.
Ixlajwi chi', 800 ab'ilto ix yil winhaj Adán chi'. Ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
930 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Set chi', 105 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh scuchan Enós.
Ixlajwi chi', 807 ab'ilto ix yil winh, ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
912 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Enós chi', 90 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh scuchan Cainán.
Ixlajwi chi', 815 ab'ilto ix yil winh, ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
905 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Cainán chi', 70 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh scuchan Mahalalel.
Ixlajwi chi', 840 ab'ilto ix yil winh, ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
910 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Mahalalel chi', 65 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh scuchan Jared.
Ixlajwi chi', 830 ab'ilto ix yil winh, ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
895 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Jared chi', 162 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh scuchan Enoc.
Ixlajwi chi', 800 ab'ilto ix yil winh, ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
962 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Enoc chi', 65 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh scuchan Matusalén.
Yictax ix alji yuninal winh chi', 300 ab'il ix sk'anab'ajej Dios winh. D'a jun pekti’ chi', ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
365 ab'il ix yil winh.
Ix sb'eyb'alej val winh icha sgana Dios, yuj chi' ay jun k'u ix satem winh, yujto ha Dios ix ik'anb'at winh yet'oc.
Ha winhaj Matusalén chi', 187 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh scuchan Lamec.
Ixlajwi chi' 782 ab'ilto ix yil winh, ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
969 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Lamec chi', 182 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix alji jun yuninal winh.
Noé ix sb'iej yuj winh yujto ix yal winh: Ha Jehová ix catab'an lum lum tik, yuj chi' te ya co munlaj t'a sat lu'um, palta a winh unin tik ol ak'an snivanil co k'ool, xchi winhaj Lamec chi'.
Ayic toxo ix alji winhaj Noé chi', 595 ab'ilto ix yil winhaj Lamec chi', ayto yuninal winh yet' yisil winh ix alji.
777 ab'il ix yil winh, ix cham winh b'ian.
Ha winhaj Noé chi', 500 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix syamanoch yalji eb' yuninal winh, aton winhaj Sem, winhaj Cam yet' winhaj Jafet.
